name: TV Shooter
description:
CONTROLS

Press Space to Left Click to toggle pause/play/start

Shoot with Right Click, Aim with the mouse.

The shapes are blotches (shapes appearing from staring at direct light)

Don't let them escape from view or you loose a life point

When lives are less than zero its game over. 

You score when you successfully shoot the blotches.

Press 'F' to toggle Fullscreen.

Press 'Z' to toggle effects.

Press 'X' to toggle debug log. (for love 2d programmers)  

(original love 2d source file is not for free)
